title: Apartment for Rent: Tandwielstraat 561, Rotterdam
description: This 25 sqm apartment is located in the Vreewijk neighborhood of Rotterdam. It is part of the Startmotor project and offers a comfortable living space. The apartment has 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. It is suitable for individuals between the ages of 18 and 27. The rent price is €695 per month, with a security deposit of €1,000. The rental agreement is indefinite. The apartment has been available for rent for 7 weeks. The neighborhood offers easy access to schools, supermarkets, and public transportation.

importantInformation.viewings: Viewings can be arranged upon request.
importantInformation.deliveryDate: The apartment is available for immediate move-in.

rentalDetails.rentPrice: €695 per month (excluding service costs of €212 per month)
